entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
